Description:
Avani Palm View Dubai Hotel & Suites soars 48 storeys high, the Dubai Marina and Palm Jumeirah beyond providing a wow backdrop. Featuring a range of accommodation configurations, Avani offers the perfect base for corporate travellers, families and long-term guests looking for contemporary comforts and style. Wake up to dazzling views. Wander an exclusive neighbourhood. Lounge by the rooftop pool sunning with a cocktail in hand, taking in the ever-evolving skyline. You will follow and implement all operational security procedures within the hotel by oversight of all contractors, suppliers or vendors working on property. You will protect all guest and staff areas of the hotel from unauthorized access or intruders and to keep the security and hotel senior management informed on all matters relating to the Security aspects of the hotel on a daily basis.Certified in Security by local Security authority
One year operating experience in a hotel Security department
Has knowledge in firefighting equipment, sprinkler systems, smoke detectors and basic knowledge of occupational health and safety.Job Details
